articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Contributors to Successful Nuclear Test
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Contributors to Successful Nuclear Test
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with the scientists, technicians, workers, soldier-builders and officials who contributed to the successful third underground nuclear test.
					 Kim Jong Un appeared in front of the building of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 He highly praised those who successfully conducted the underground nuclear test as part of the practical countermeasure to defend the security and sovereignty of the country, thus fully demonstrating once again that Korea does what it is determined to do and instilling faith in sure victory and optimism into the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 He had a photo taken with them, expressing expectation and conviction that they would achieve greater successes in their scientific researches to further bolster up the nuclear deterrent for self-defence by waging a dynamic drive for breaking through cutting-edge science and technology with the same vim and vigor with which they succeeded in the nuclear test.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Kyong Hui, Choe Thae Bok, Pak To Chun, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, Mun Kyong Dok, Jo Yon Jun and Hong Sung Mu.

articles.title: Contributors to Successful Nuclear Test Leave Here amid Warm Send-off
articles.content:
Contributors to Successful Nuclear Test Leave Here amid Warm Send-off
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Scientists, technicians, workers, officials in the field of national defence science and soldier-builders left here Wednesday after wrapping up their significant itineraries in Pyongyang. They contributed to succeeding in the third underground nuclear test.
					 They were sent off by Kim Yong Nam, Pak To Chun and Jo Yon Jun and other officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Service personnel of the Korean People's Army and Pyongyangites warmly sent them off along the route between Pyongyang Railway Station and the plaza in front of the April 25 House of Culture, via Chollima Street, Pothong Gate, Yongung Street, Jonsung Square and Pipha Street.

articles.title: Nuclear Developers Spend Enjoyable Days in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Nuclear Developers Spend Enjoyable Days in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Scientists, technicians, workers, soldier-builders and officials who made significant contributions to the successful 3rd underground nuclear test in the DPRK spent enjoyable days here. 
					 Wherever they went in the city, they were accorded warm hospitality by citizens.
					
					 Staying at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel, they enjoyed themselves at amusement centers, including the People's Open-air Ice Rink and the Skate Park, and took special dishes prepared exclusively for them at well-known restaurants.
					
					 The Pyongyang Folklore Park hosted a welcoming ceremony in honor of them on the Full Moon Day (Feb. 24).
					
					 Seized with excitement at such warm hospitality, they said in unison:
					
					 "We are very grateful to the dear respected Kim Jong Un for having honored us with the title of DPRK Hero.
					
					 The recent success in nuclear test was attributable to the foresight and wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung, general secretary Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We will go ahead with the test so as not to tolerate any attempt to infringe upon the nation's sovereignty."

articles.title: National Meeting of Active Three-Revolution Team Members Held
articles.content:
National Meeting of Active Three-Revolution Team Members Held
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- A national meeting of active three-revolution team members was held here on Wednesday.
					 Present there were Choe Yong Rim, Choe Thae Bok, Pak To Chun, and leading officials of party organizations in provinces, cities and counties, and exemplary three-revolution team members from across the country and.
					
					 The meeting reviewed the successes and experience gained in the work of the three-revolution teams and discussed measures to thoroughly carry out the important tasks in the work "Let Us Bring About Fresh Turn in Work of Three-Revolution Teams as Required by New Situation" published by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the start of the three-revolution team movement.
					
					 His work was read out at the meeting.
					
					 He in the work said that President Kim Il Sung kindled the flame of the movement in February 1973, 40 years ago, adding that this was an important step of historic significance in vigorously conducting the three revolutions, ideological, technical and cultural, and thereby successfully carrying out the cause of modeling whole society on the Juche idea.
					
					 The three-revolution team movement has developed to be a powerful engine promoting the ideological, technical and cultural revolutions under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il and fully displayed its vitality in the efforts for building socialism, he noted.
					
					 He specified  tasks and ways for bringing  about a great turn in the work of three-revolution teams as required by the new situation and expressed belief and conviction that the team members would positively contribute to accomplishing the cause of building a thriving nation, bearing deep in mind the trust of the party.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that the publication of Kim Jong Un's work provided important guidelines for dynamically promoting the three revolutions as it newly clarified the significance and importance of the movement and set forth tasks and ways for waging it. 
					
					 They called for setting bold and ambitious targets for putting the national economy on a  Juche-oriented, modern and IT basis and doing  everything with wisdom and enthusiasm by learning from the mettle and spirit of space conquerors and those who developed nuclear weapons,
					
					 They underscored the need to bring about a new turn in the work of the three-revolution teams under the leadership of Kim Jong Un and fulfil their duties in opening up a turning phase of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Three-Revolution Team Movement Instrumental to Building Socialism in Korea
articles.content:
Three-Revolution Team Movement Instrumental to Building Socialism in Korea
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Forty years has elapsed since the three-revolution team movement started in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					The movement is aimed at dynamically carrying out the three revolutions, ideological, technological and cultural, in all realms of social life.
					
					 After the establishment of the socialist system in the DPRK in the late 1950s, the Workers' Party of Korea was faced with the tasks to eliminate the backwardness in the fields of ideology, technology and culture and carry on socialist construction on a higher stage.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung initiated the three-revolution team movement in early Juche 62 (1973) and saw to it that three-revolution teams were organized with hardcore party officials and university graduates to be active at factories and farms throughout the country.
					
					 The movement helps combine political guidance with technological one, encourage superiors to assist their subordinates and galvanize the popular masses into action, thus pushing ahead with the three revolutions.
					
					 General secretary Kim Jong Il paid deep attention to the three-revolution team movement in his lifetime. He consummated the theory on the movement and wisely led the movement to fully display its validity and vitality.
					
					 Thanks to the energetic efforts of the team members, the ideological unity of society based on the Juche idea has been cemented and the socialist way of life established under the slogan "One for all and all for one!" Their activities also resulted in strengthened creative collaboration between workers and technicians and brisk mass technical innovations.
					
					 The movement speeded up the self-reliance in the nation's economy, the updating of technical means and the scientification of production and management. And it helped make lots of achievements for improving the people's living standard.
					
					Meanwhile, it greatly contributed to stepping up the construction of socialist culture.
					
					 The practical experience shows that the three-revolution team movement is instrumental to successfully accelerating the socialist cause of Juche.

articles.title: DPRK, U.S. Basketball Players Have Joint Training
articles.content:
DPRK, U.S. Basketball Players Have Joint Training
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Basketball players of the DPRK and the U.S. conducted a joint training in Ryugyong Jong Ju Yong Gymnasium here on Wednesday.
					 Participating in it were U-18 players of the DPRK and ex-player of the NBA of the U.S. Dennis Rodman and his party.
					
					 Match tactics, training mode and technique movement of the players of the two countries were exchanged at the joint training.
					
					 A workshop on basketball technique took place that day.

articles.title: DPRK's Satellite Officially Registered at UN
articles.content:
DPRK's Satellite Officially Registered at UN
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The DPRK presented its paper for the registration of its satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 at the UN as a signatory to the "Convention on Registration of Objects Launched into Outer Space" after its successful launch on December 12, Juche 101 (2012).
					 Recently the UN Space Office worked out UN official document (ST/SG/SER. E/662) as regards the registration of the DPRK's satellite and posted it on the satellite registry of its website and the UN electronic archives website respectively.  This brought to an end the work for registering the DPRK's satellite launched after going through a legitimate procedure according to international law concerned.

articles.title: Greetings to Cyprian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Cyprian President
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Nicos Anastasiades upon his election as president of Cyprus.
					 Kim in his message wished the Cyprian president success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country and its people's wellbeing in the belief that the relations between the two countries would favourably develop in the mutual interests.

articles.title: Russian Political Party Leader Meets WPK Delegation
articles.content:
Russian Political Party Leader Meets WPK Delegation
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Leader of "A Just Russia" S. M. Mironov met and had a talk with the delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Ri Yong Chol, vice department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, on Tuesday. The delegation attended the 15th Congress of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation.
					 The leader sincerely wished the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the DPRK, good health and success in his responsible work.
					
					 He said he has always remembered the honor of being received by general secretary Kim Jong Il during his visit to the DPRK.
					
					 He referred to the fact that the Korean people succeeded in launching satellite launch and conducting the third underground nuclear test.
					
					 He expressed sympathy with the DPRK exerting efforts to bolster up its defence capability to cope with the prevailing grave situation.
					
					 He stressed that his party attaching importance to the development of relations with the WPK supports the DPRk's building a thriving nation and rejects the attempts of the imperialists to settle the issue of the Korean Peninsula by force.
					
					 He expressed conviction that Korea would be reunified according to the reunification proposal by federal formula set forth by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Present there were Tatarinov, chief of the party central body and a staff member of the DPRK embassy in Moscow.

articles.title: Russian Political Party Hails DPRK's Great Success in Developing Its Defence Capability
articles.content:
Russian Political Party Hails DPRK's Success in Developing Its Defence Capability
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Thanks to the leadership and great idea of the dear respected Kim Jong Un the Korean people will surely emerge victorious despite all difficulties.
					 Ovsyannikov, member of the Supreme Council of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, said this when meeting the delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) led by Ri Yong Chol, vice department director of its Central Committee, on Tuesday. The delegation took part in the 15th Congress of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation.
					
					 He said that it is the invariable stand of the leadership of his party to further develop the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations with the WPK, he said.
					
					 He congratulated the DPRK on its recent great successes in bolstering up its defence capability.
					
					 The Liberal Democratic Party of Russia knows well about the fact that the aim of the anti-DPRK rackets kicked off by the U.S. and the West is to block its independent development, he said.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Brands Military Drills as Politically-Motivated Provocation against DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Brands Military Drills as Politically-Motivated Provocation against DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces plan Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises under the pretext of "annual" ones.
					 This is an undisguised and deliberate, politically-motivated military provocation gravely threatening the security of the DPRK.
					
					 A touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the U.S. hostile moves against the DPRK that have been stepped up after its legitimate satellite launch and underground nuclear test for defending its sovereignty.
					
					 Against this backdrop, the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces are trying to set fire to the power magazine by kicking off undisguised war drills against the DPRK.
					
					 Frantic saber-rattling reminiscent of an actual war will be staged across south Korea for nearly two months under the codenames of Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.
					
					 This can not but be a very dangerous military move aimed to ignite an all-out war on the Korean Peninsula where slightest military move and even an accidental event may lead to an all-out war.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean forces have escalated military confrontation with the DPRK after its satellite launch.
					
					 After its third underground nuclear test, in particular, the south Korean military had confabs with the U.S. on the issue of including the concept of "preemptive attack" in the "tailored containment strategy", openly crying out for "mounting a preemptive attack even if it may entail a war."
					
					 A large number of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and latest nuclear attack means have been deployed in south Korea and its vicinity and huge forces of the three services of the south Korean army have been, in fact, put on alert as in wartime.
					
					 Maneuvers like combined naval drill and combined anti-submarine drill have been perpetrated by the U.S. and the south Korean forces across south Korea every day.
					
					 Through Key Resolve and Foal Eagle the U.S. seeks to materialize its scenario for stifling the DPRK as an adventurous "preemptive nuclear attack" on it.
					
					 This is proven by the programs of the commanding post drill aimed to cope with various circumstances such as the U.S. reinforcements' deployment in the Korean Peninsula under the simulated conditions of an actual war and more than 20 combined mobile exercises to be staged by the U.S. and south Korean coalition forces in the land, air and sea.
					
					 The hostile forces had better stop bluffing.
					
					 It is the firm will of the army and people of the DPRK to react to the military pressure with an all-out action and counter nuclear threat with nuclear deterrent for self-defence and to sweep the enemies out of the earth and win a victory in the war for national reunification.
					
					 The warning of the DPRK is by no means a threat.

articles.title: DPRK Will Blow Up Strongholds of Aggression: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Blow Up Strongholds of Aggression: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces try to frighten the DPRK through Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises, but no force can prevent all its service personnel and people from advancing towards the final victory in the spirit of the great Paektusan nation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The DPRK has matchless strength of justice capable of resolutely meeting any challenge of aggression forces, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The invincible military capability the DPRK has built under the banner of Songun serves as muscle of justice for winning a final decisive battle against the brigandish U.S. imperialists and their stooges, south Korean puppet forces keen to invade it.
					
					 Its revolutionary armed forces are waiting for the moment to annihilate the enemy by giving fullest play to the tremendous combat capability while keeping themselves on the highest alert.
					
					 If the enemies provoke the DPRK through the joint military exercises at any cost, its army and people will deal immediate, merciless and deadly blows at them and achieve the historic cause of national reunification. This is the firm determination of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The all-out action launched by them to protect the honor of the Korean nation will make a clean sweep of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces and all other scurvy wretches who have done all sorts of wrongs for decades. Once the Korean People's Army opens fire to annihilate the enemy, this will blow up the cursed concrete wall and turn into ashes at once the den of evils which have imposed misfortunes and disasters on the Korean nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Japanese Prime Minister for His Outbursts Denying Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Japanese Prime Minister for His Outbursts Denying Sexual Slavery 
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- At the Budget Committee of the House of Representatives, Japanese Prime Minister Abe asserted as regards the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army that "there is no evidence proving that soldiers of the Imperial Japanese Army broke into houses and took away Korean women to reduce them to comfort women."
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 What Abe uttered is the brazen-faced and impudent assertion and a far-fetched insistence that white is black to gratify his greed.
					
					 The sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army was neither commercial transaction by a few brokers nor "voluntary practice" of "comfort women". This was the hideous crime against humanity planned and perpetrated by the government authorities and aggressors.
					
					  The Korean people's grudge against Japan can never be settled no matter how many times the Japanese reactionaries may beg for a pardon, their knees bent. This being a hard fact, the Japanese reactionaries are working hard to justify the sexual slavery unprecedented in history and keep it buried into oblivion.
					
					 The Japanese authorities have been so base and wicked in its attitude that even the U.S. authorities, their senior ally, served a warning to them.
					
					 Abe in his public appearance once again denied the direct involvement of the Imperial Japanese Army in the sexual slavery. This was prompted by his sinister intention to make Japan repeat its past history in the future so that it may realize its old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" and emerge "leader of Asia".
					
					 Japan seeks to win public mind-set with a high-sounding motto to regain the position of "strong Japan" and put spurs to the militarist chariot for realizing its scenario for turning itself into a military giant and launching overseas reinvasion. This is the situation of Japan today.
					
					 However, there is something the Japanese politicians should bear in mind.
					
					 Human beings must be placed above politics and conscience and morality above law. 
					
					 Japan should make an unconditional and honest apology and reparation for its past crimes. This is the only way for it to live as a member of the international community.

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses Danger of Key Resolve, Foal Eagle
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses Danger of Key Resolve, Foal Eagle 
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean warmongers plan to stage DPRK-targeted joint military exercises Key Resolve and Foal Eagle from March 1 with huge armed forces involved.
					 Minju Joson Wednesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The war maneuvers are a very dangerous military provocation aimed at igniting a war against the DPRK by deliberately escalating tensions.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and warmongers insist that the drills do not pose threat to anyone, describing them as "annual and defensive" but it is nonsensical.
					
					 In actuality, the U.S. and warmongers have made steady preparations for a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK through Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.
					
					 The fact that U.S. nuclear-powered carrier, B-52 long-range strategic bombers and other military hardware will be involved in them brings into bold relief their aggressive nature and danger.
					
					 What cannot be overlooked is that they will be staged at a time when the U.S. and warmongers' moves for a war against the DPRK have reached a very reckless stage. They are escalating the moves for a war against the DPRK after the DPRK's satellite launch and third underground nuclear test.
					
					 But they should stop acting rashly.
					
					 If they unleash a war of aggression through Key Resolve and Foal Eagle, the army and people of the DPRK will give vent to the pent-up grievance and blow up the strongholds of aggression and provocation.

articles.title: Final Victory in Showdown with U.S. Is in Store for DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Final Victory in Showdown with U.S. Is in Store for DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK will win victory in the showdown with the U.S. as they did in the past, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a bylined article.
					 It is because they are led by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un heading the Songun revolution that they can proudly say the final victory is in store for them in the showdown with the U.S. which draws global attention, says the article, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Un has invariably carried forward the Songun revolutionary leadership with which Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il led the Korean revolution to victory.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, possessed of the spirit of Mt. Paektu and the matchless courage undaunted by any storm and tempest, has led the struggle of all the service persons and people to final victory.
					
					 He possesses extraordinary military wisdom and clairvoyance and matchless pluck. His courage and pluck are source of the invincible power of Songun Korea.
					
					 Single-minded unity of the DPRK, more powerful than nuclear weapons, fundamentally guarantees the triumph in the showdown with its hostile forces.
					
					 The unity is the supreme power of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea and the source of its invincibility.
					
					 Kim Jong Un has reliably defended the lofty revolutionary heritage of the single-minded unity bequeathed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and further cemented it.
					
					 Victory is in store for the army and people of the DPRK vigorously advancing, rallied close behind Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Tourists to DPRK Are Expected to Rise This Year
articles.content:
Tourists to DPRK Are Expected to Rise This Year
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The number of foreign tourists to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is expected to increase this year amid the growing worldwide interest in the country, which successfully carried out its peaceful satellite launch and underground nuclear test in recent months.
					 In particular, the arrivals will be on rise from European countries, including Germany, UK and the Netherlands.
					
					 The figure of applicants for tourism in the DPRK by plane has already exceeded last year's twice while that of those for tourism by bicycle increased sharply as compared with last year's.
					
					 International railway service has been improved and regular and non-regular flights from various regions will be available.
					
					 Mini-golf playing in the Rungna People's Pleasure Park in Pyongyang will be one of attractions this year.
					
					 Attractive destinations are Mts. Paektu, Chilbo and Kumgang and Ullim Falls, Songdowon and other scenic spots in the east coastal area of the country.
					
					 Tourism in the DPRK will help the tourists get a deep understanding of the history and culture of Korea and the mental spirit of the local people in the efforts for building a highly civilized socialist country.

articles.title: DPRK Witnesses Development in Koryo Medicine
articles.content:
DPRK Witnesses Development in Koryo Medicine
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- It has been 34 years since President Kim Il Sung published the celebrated work "On Developing Traditional Korean Medicine".
					 The work, published on February 27, Juche 68 (1979), gives an all-round exposition of theoretical and practical matters arising in developing Koryo medicine, a traditional medicine. It has served as guidelines for developing the Juche-based national medicine
					
					 Since the work was published, a well-organized system for developing the traditional medicine has been established throughout the country and the medicine has reached the higher stage of its development.
					
					 The Academy of Koryo Medicine in Pyongyang plays a pivotal role in developing the medicine in the country, while carrying on joint study and exchanges of science and technologies with other countries.
					
					 Koryo therapies, including cupping, acupuncture and finger pressing, are applied to patients in hospitals and clinics throughout the country. Multi-purpose acupuncture and other newly developed traditional therapies are applicable even to obstinate diseases.
					
					 Koryo medicine-based remedies for advanced gastric cancer and other diseases are popular among patients.
					
					 Meanwhile, many books on Koryo medicine were brought out to further improve the traditional medicine. Among them are "Principles of Koryo Medicine", "Treatment with Acupuncture and Moxibustion" and "Book on Clinical Koryo Therapy".
					
					 In the country there are a large number of pharmaceutical factories manufacturing Koryo medicine on an extractive and scientific basis.

articles.title: Seriously Burnt KPA Officer and His Family Completely Cured
articles.content:
Seriously Burnt KPA Officer and His Family Completely Cured
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Officer of the Korean People's Army Choe Hyok Chol and his family were completely cured of serious burns in the DPRK.
					 They got third degree burns on 30 percent of their bodies in a sudden accident early in November last year. They were admitted to the Kangwon Provincial People's Hospital.
					
					 They were in a critical condition, unable to properly breathe often.
					
					 Doctors' consultative meetings were held more than 80 times, a series of skin grafting operations took place and every necessary measure was taken to cure them.
					
					 Upward of 700 persons, including officials, doctors and nurses of the hospital, service personnel and students of Wonsan University of Medicine, donated their blood and skin for operations. Officials and other people visited the patients, bringing with them rare medicinal herbs and nutritious food, though they varied in their occupation and residential areas.
					
					 The patients left the hospital on Wednesday after being fully recovered in more than 110 days.

articles.title: "Kanghwa Island Treaty", Fabrication of Japanese Imperialists
articles.content:
"Kanghwa Island Treaty", Fabrication of Japanese Imperialists
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- A special lecture was given at the National House of Class Education here on Wednesday to give visitors a better understanding of the "Kanghwa Island Treaty" faked up by the Japanese imperialists on Feb. 27, 1876.
					 After "1868 Meiji Restoration", Japan called for "diplomacy for conquering Korea" and, to this end, it sent a military vessel "Unyo-maru" to the sea off Korea's Kanghwa Island in 1875. 
					
					 Japan's forces aboard the vessel made a premeditated armed provocation against the Korean army. Later, Japan tried hard to pass the buck for the armed conflict to the Korean side.
					
					 Its provocation went on in November and December that year.
					
					 In January 1876, Japan dispatched to Korea more than 800 troops aboard six vessels, together with a delegation for talks.
					
					 They took measurement of Korea's territorial waters and came up to the sea off Chojijin of Kanghwa Island early in February.
					
					 The invaders deployed some 400 troops and four artillery guns at the talks site, pressurizing the Korean side's delegate to sign a draft treaty they had already worked out. They threatened that relations between the two countries would be severed and Japanese troops would land on Korea if there was no positive reply from Korea.
					
					 Moreover, they refused to write down the articles proposed by the Korean side in the treaty. Thus, the 12-article "Kanghwa Island Treaty" was one-sidedly inked.
					
					 The treaty provided Japan with all privileged rights in Korea, paving the way for aggression of Korea, to say nothing of its interference in Korea's political and economic affairs.
					
					 Now the Japanese reactionaries have persistently claimed the ownership of the Tok Islets, an inviolable part of Korea's territory, far from making an apology for the hideous crimes it committed against the Korean people in the past.
					
					 Han Ung Sik, a 36-year-old Pyongyang citizen, told KCNA:
					
					 "Japan can never hush up the crimes it committed during its occupation of Korea, no matter how much water may flow under bridge.
					
					 It should abandon its claim to the islets at once."

articles.title: Urgent Solution of Labor Issues Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Urgent Solution of Labor Issues Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The Emergency Situation Council for Urgently Coping with Lay-off, Part-time Job and Destruction of Trade Unions in south Korea, including the Confederation of Trade Unions, the Solidarity for Progress and other labor, civic and social organizations, held a press conference on Feb. 25 in Seoul calling for a solution to the labor issues.
					 The speakers recalled at the press conference that the organization called for settling the situation at Hanjin Heavy Industries, Ssangyong Motors, Yusong Enterprise and Hyundai Motors and the labor issues including the stop to crackdown upon the Government Employees' Union.
					
					 Nevertheless, the "government" authorities dismissed the chairman and the secretary general of the union and sought to outlaw the Teachers Union, disclosing their intention to steadily crack down upon workers, they said, and went on:
					
					  They urged the "government" to conduct the state investigation into the situation at Ssangyong Motors, reinstate the dismissed workers and turn part-time job into a regular one.
					
					 They also called for lifting the unreasonable disciplinary measures against government and public workers.
					
					 At the end of the conference, they staged a demonstration.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Solidarity for Abolishing Discriminations against Disabled Persons held a press conference at which it urged the "government" authorities to take a step for guaranteeing the disabled persons' right to existence.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Has Gone Totally Bust: S. Korean Media Person
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Has Gone Totally Bust: S. Korean Media Person
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Jaju Minbo, an internet paper of south Korea, on Feb. 22 carried an article written in prison by its representative Ri Chang Gi chiding the U.S. policy to stifle the DPRK.
					 The article said that U.S. diplomats and experts who either visited the DPRK or negotiated with its diplomats contribute articles to south Korean papers every day in which they admit the total failure of U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 In a word, the U.S. policy towards north Korea, whether it is for engagement or for blockade, has failed, the article said. 
					
					 Recalling that the north warned the U.S. of the second and third countermeasures, it noted this is an indication of the north's resolution to launch an all-out offensive to completely shatter the U.S. hegemony.
					
					 It is self-evident that the U.S. hegemony will no longer work in case the north demonstrates its might before the world once again, the article said.
					
					 Such prudent remarks are heard from the U.S. as it is well aware that the north will take the 2nd and 3rd countermeasures if the U.S. opts for "sanctions" and blockade as now, the article added.
					
					 It urged the south Korean authorities to stop talking nonsense about increased military spending and choose reasonable solutions.

articles.title: Japan's "Territorial Claim to Tok Islets" Censured by Japanese Figure
articles.content:
Japan's "Territorial Claim to Tok Islets" Censured by Japanese Figure
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the Society for the Study of Contemporary History of Japan strongly denounced the Japanese government for openly making a "territorial claim to Tok Islets", according to south Korean CBS on February 25.
					 In an article titled "We oppose Japan's reoccupation of Tok Islets" the chairman accused the present government of letting loose sophism that Tok Islets are "part of an inviolable territory of Japan", while calling them "Takeshima".
					
					 This is aimed to grab the islets at any cost, he said.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Test Hailed by Russian, Nepali Figures
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Test Hailed by Russian, Nepali Figures
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Russian and Nepali figures released statements on February 14 and 15 as regards the successful third underground nuclear test in the DPRK.
					 Ivan Slukhai, chairman of the War Veterans Committee in Moscow, said:
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear test was a measure for self-defence to cope with the U.S. nuclear blackmail with nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The DPRK conducted a nuclear test to cope with the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" against it, demonstrating the will to defend its sovereignty to the last.
					
					 The UNSC should take issue with the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear blackmail against the DPRK, to begin with, instead of infringing upon the DPRK's sovereignty and violating its right to launch satellite.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people will surely emerge victorious in their struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and achieving national reunification under the wise leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics, said:
					
					 The DPRK's recent nuclear test was a clear message to the U.S. which has persisted in the hostile policy towards the DPRK and to the UNSC, which has lost its impartiality by toeing the U.S. policy.
					
					 I am sure that the DPRK's successful underground nuclear test will make a great contribution to the world peace.
					
					 I rejoice over the successful nuclear test conducted by the DPRK and congratulate Supreme Leader Marshal Kim Jong Un on it.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Noble Life Praised by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Noble Life Praised by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups illustrated with the portrait of smiling general secretary Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The February 11-17 of the Lao paper Heng Ngan in its article titled "Kim Jong Il and his life" said that he successfully accomplished the cause of immortalizing President Kim Il Sung, leading a noble life.
					
					 The paper referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il spared nothing for the people and did not allow the erection of even a small statue for him.
					
					 The Mexican paper Unidad Nacional on January 31 carried an article praising his noble outlook on the people under the headline of "Kim Jong Il, a legendary great man".
					
					 On the same day the Bulgarian paper Zaraba devoted one whole page to articles praising him.
					
					 The paper said in an article titled "Patriotism" what profound patriotism he had can be clearly explained by the fact that he worked heart and soul to defend socialist Korea and build a thriving nation.
					
					 The paper in an article titled "Succession to socialist cause" noted that the socialist cause pioneered by Kim Il Sung and successfully pushed forward by Kim Jong Il is being carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un without any deflection.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Ukraine, Belarus and UK on February 15 and 16 to mark the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 On display at the meeting places were photos dealing with exploits of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were books and photos introducing the true picture of Songun Korea.
					
					 Nikolai Polishk, chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that the world progressive people are revering Kim Jong Il as a peerlessly great man, adding that he made a great theoretical and practical contribution to carrying out the socialist cause.
					
					 Oleg Novikov, chairman of the February 16 Belarus Youth Association for the Study of Juche Idea and Songun Politics, and other speakers highly praised the exploits he performed by making a great contribution to carrying out the cause of global independence.
					
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, noted that the Korean people would vigorously advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism, holding him in high esteem as an eternal leader, under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, great successor to the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Letters to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Meetings, lectures, seminars, book and photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Pakistan, Iran, Brazil, Uganda, Tunisia and Italy from February 14 to 18 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were photos on revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were books, including works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, and photos showing the successes made by the Korean people in building a thriving nation.
					
					 Participants in film shows watched Korean films including "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation" and "Reply of Korea."
					
					 Speakers at the meeting in Pakistan highly praised Kim Jong Il for his noble popular personality and undying feats, expressing the highest respect to him who made a great contribution to the prosperity of the DPRK and the accomplishment of the human cause of independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK said that Kim Jong Il performed great exploits guaranteeing an eternal foundation of socialist Korea and its rosy future, holding aloft the banner of Songun, and left them as a legacy.
					
					 An adviser to the Ugandan president noted that though Kim Jong Il passed away, his exploits would always be remembered by the people of Uganda.
					
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement called for maintaining high vigilance against the U.S. imperialists' moves to provoke a new war on the Korean Peninsula and extending support and solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people.
					
					 The secretary general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea noted that Kim Jong Il wrote a lot of works, imbuing the world progressive people with firm faith in the victory of socialism.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting in Pakistan.

articles.title: French, Swiss Bodies Hail DPRK's Nuclear Test
articles.content:
French, Swiss Bodies Hail DPRK's Nuclear Test
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- French and Swiss bodies released statements in support of the statement of the spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry dated Feb. 12.
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association noted in a statement on Feb. 13 that the DPRK conducted the 3rd underground nuclear test to cope with the moves of the U.S. and its allies to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The statement continued:
					
					 The spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK, clarifying its stance to defend the supreme interests of the country in its statement, warned that if the U.S. persistently takes a hostile approach towards the DPRK, making the situation complicated, the DPRK will be left with no option but to take stronger second and third countermeasures in succession.
					
					 It is the fair public opinion that the U.S. attempted to suffocate the DPRK, but it could not bring its people to their knees and sanctions and pressure no longer work on it.
					
					 We extend solidarity to the people of the DPRK all out to defend its sovereignty to cope with the prevailing situation and bitterly condemn the moves of the U.S. to create world-wide atmosphere of stifling it in the UN arena.
					
					 If the U.S. truly wants peace and security in the world, it must roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK at once.
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement on Feb. 14 stressed that the DPRK's nuclear test can never be a violation of international law.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 It is quite natural for the DPRK to take tough countermeasures to cope with the ever-escalating nuclear threat from the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 If the U.S. persistently pursues the policy for invading the DPRK, it will continue taking measures for self-defence. In case the U.S. chooses the road of conflict in the end, the army and people of the DPRK will defend its sovereignty without fail and accomplish the cause of national reunification.
					
					 We support the statement of the spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry and send solidarity to the Korean people.
					
					 U.S., hands off Korea!

articles.title: British Political Party's Organ Hails DPRK's Satellite Launch
articles.content:
British Political Party's Organ Hails DPRK's Satellite Launch
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The January-February issue of Line of March, the organ of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), carried an article titled "DPRK's exercise of the right to use space for peaceful purposes is aimed to defend its sovereignty."
					 The article said that the DPRK successfully fired Kwangmyongsong 3-2 into the space in Dec. last year.
					
					 The U.S. backed the fabrication of the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK as part of its actions hostile to the DPRK, an expression of its antipathy for the ideology and social system of the DPRK, said the article.
					
					 The "resolution" is a hostile action of disregarding the legitimate international standard, it noted.
					
					 The DPRK regards the right to use space for peaceful purposes as a matter related to building a thriving nation and defending the dignity of the nation, not just a matter related to exercising the right to develop outer space, it said, and went on:
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never allow their supreme interests of the nation to be violated.
					
					 The Korean people will never forget the days when they underwent hardships as Korea was a small and weak nation, but will continue launching satellites and rockets in the future, upholding the banner of socialism.
					
					 The country has the right to develop the space for peaceful purposes as others have, and it is an inviolable right.
					
					 Big powers that monopolize missiles and their tests are using spying drones for several purposes, but it is not referred to as an illegal action.
					
					 The U.S. has the biggest stockpile of missiles in the world.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their allies are deliberately escalating the tensions, describing the DPRK as a "war-like country".
					
					 The Party calls upon all the progressive forces in the world loving justice to struggle against the hysteric anti-DPRK reckless moves of the imperialists and achieve firm unity.

articles.title: British Bodies Condemn Japan for Suppressing Chongryon
articles.content:
British Bodies Condemn Japan for Suppressing Chongryon
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association made public a joint statement on Feb. 20 denouncing Japan for escalating crackdown upon the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement lashed out at the Japanese authorities for going reckless to do harm to the DPRK and suppress the body under the pretext of the DPRK's 3rd underground nuclear test.
					
					 Chongryon is a dignified overseas compatriots body of the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' suppression of Chongryon is an intolerable challenge and human rights abuse against the DPRK.
					
					 We bitterly condemn their suppression of Chongryon.
					
					 We also called on the progressive British people to join in the movement for solidarity with Chongryon.

articles.title: DPRK's Tough Measures Backed by Russian Body
articles.content:
DPRK's Tough Measures Backed by Russian Body
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK released a statement on Feb. 15 in support of the tough measures taken by the DPRK to cope with the U.S. hostile policy towards it.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We express full support and solidarity for the political line of the DPRK for defending the sovereignty of the country from the war moves of the U.S. and its stooges to invade it.
					
					 The world progressives are closely watching the U.S., which is misleading the international opinion in gross violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK by applying the double-standards to it.
					
					 The U.S. is abusing the UN Security Council to attach legality to aggression and war.
					
					 The U.S.-led imperialist forces are moving to bring down socialism in the DPRK but they will prove futile.
					
					 The DPRK's measures contribute to ensuring the peace in the Asia-Pacific region including the Korean Peninsula, and clearly show the world how to react to the U.S.
					
					 That the DPRK has access to nukes is a just measure to defend the sovereignty and independence of the country and the nation from the open threats of the U.S. and its stooges.
					
					 We will make positive efforts to defend the peace and security on the peninsula.
					
					 It is extremely important to establish a fair international order for the peace and security of the world, including Asia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Brazil
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- "1. Juche Music" of general secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Theory of Musical Art" was posted on the website of the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea on Feb. 19.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se retrata con contribuyentes a prueba nuclear
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se retrata con contribuyentes a prueba nuclear
 Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tomo una foto de recuerdo con los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros, constructores militares y funcionarios quienes contribuyeron al exito de la tercera prueba nuclear subterranea.
					 El salio al patio frente al edificio del Comite Central del Partido.
					
					 Evaluo altamente los meritos de los contribuyentes quienes a traves de la exitosa prueba nuclear subterranea realizada como parte de las contramedidas sustanciales para defender la seguridad y la soberania del pais, demostraron otra vez a todo el mundo que Corea cumple todo lo que decide e inspiraron al ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC la conviccion y optimismo de la victoria definitiva.
					
					 Y se fotografio con los participantes en la filmacion expresando la esperanza y conviccion  de que ellos lograran mayores exitos en la investigacion cientifica para consolidar el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa al dinamizar la campana para conquistar las tecnologias supersofisticadas trabajando con el impetu con que ejecutaron con exito la tercera prueba nuclear.
					
					 En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Kyong Hui, Choe Thae Bok, Pak To Chun, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, Mun Kyong Dok, Jo Yon Jun y Hong Sung Mu.

articles.title: Tiene lugar entrenamiento conjunto de baloncesto RPDC-EE.UU.
articles.content:
Tiene lugar entrenamiento conjunto de baloncesto RPDC-EE.UU.
 Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este miercoles en el Coliseo Deportivo Jong Ju Yong de Ryugyong, enclavado en esta capital, el entrenamiento conjunto de jugadores coreanos y estadounidenses de baloncesto.
					 Tomaron parte en la ocasion los jugadores coreanos sub-18 y el jugador retirado de NBA (Asociacion Nacional de Baloncesto) de Estados Unidos, Dennis Rodman, y su comitiva.
					
					 En la ocasion hubo intercambio sobre la tactica de competencia, el modo de ejercicio, los movimientos tecnicos, de los jugadores de ambos paises, y otros 
					
					 Este dia, se impartio un cursillo tecnico de baloncesto.

articles.title: ACNC califica de provocaciones ejercicios militares conjuntos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC califica de provocaciones ejercicios militares conjuntos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos planean librar otra vez los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle" describiendolos como "anuales". 
					 Esto es una premeditada provocacion politica y militar que amenaza gravemente la seguridad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					 Ahora la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana esta a punto de explosion por la campana anti-RPDC librada por EE.UU. cuestionando el lanzamiento de satelite artificial y la prueba nuclear subterranea de la RPDC.
					
					 En el marco de "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle", se desarrollaran durante casi dos meses en toda la extension surcoreana los ejercicios belicos que suponen la guerra real.
					
					 Esos aventureros movimientos militares parten del intento de desatar sin falta una guerra total en la Peninsula Coreana donde un minimo movimiento militar o un accidente casual pueden extenderse a la guerra. 
					
					 Despues del lanzamiento de satelite de la RPDC, se amplian de modo escalonado el alboroto militar de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos contra ella.
					
					 En particular, despues de la tercera prueba nuclear subterranea de la RPDC, los compinches de la capa militar surcoreana intentan incluir el concepto de "ataque preventivo" en la "estrategia del disuasivo de forma de ajuste" con EE.UU. diciendo publicamente que "asestaremos el 'ataque preventivo' con la decision de hacer la guerra".
					
					 Ya enormes efectivos norteamericanos y medios de ataque nuclear ultramodernos fueron emplazados en el Sur de Corea y su contorno. En tanto, las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas surcoreanas entraron en la disposicion de guerra.
					
					  En toda la extension surcoreana se desarrollan diariamente los ejercicios belicos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea de toda indole como el simulacro combinado maritimo y el antisubmarino.
					
					  A traves de los simulacros "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle", EE.UU. pretende extender su intento de aplastamiento militar a la RPDC al "ataque preventivo nuclear". 
					
					  Lo testimonian el entrenamiento del puesto de mando para hacer frente a diferentes circunstancias tales como el despliegue de los uniformados norteamericanos de refuerzo en la Peninsula Coreana en el posible tiempo de guerra y mas de 20 ejercicios moviles que se desarrollaran en la tierra, el cielo y el mar por las fuerzas armadas combinadas EE.UU.-Sur de Corea. 
					
					  Las fuerzas hostiles no deben actuar con arrogancia. 
					
					  El ejercito y pueblo coreanos tienen la ferrea voluntad de aniquilar a los enemigos y lograr el triunfo en la guerra por la reunificacion de la patria respondiendo a la presion militar con el enfrentamiento total, y a la amenaza nuclear con el disuasivo nuclear  autodefensiva. 
					
					 La advertencia de la RPDC no es una amenaza.

articles.title: Entidad rusa apoya medidas de RPDC frente a politica hostil de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Entidad rusa apoya medidas de RPDC frente a politica hostil de EE.UU.
 Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ACNC) -- La Asociacion Rusa de Amistad y Cooperacion Cultural con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 15 una declaracion de apoyo a las medidas sobreduras de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea frente a la politica hostil de Estados Unidos.
					 La nota senala como sigue:
					
					 Expresamos el apoyo irrestricto y la solidaridad con la linea politica de la RPDC para rechazar la guerra de agresion del imperio y sus lacayos y defender la soberania del pais.
					
					 La humanidad progresista del mundo observa al dedillo que EE.UU., al aplicar sobre la RPDC la politica de doble rasero, desvia la opinion publica internacional y viola flagrantemente la soberania de este pais socialista.
					
					 EE.UU. abusa del nombre del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU para dar legitimidad a la agresion y la guerra.
					
					 Las fuerzas imperialistas encabezadas por EE.UU. maniobran por aplastar el socialismo de la RPDC, pero no evitara el fracaso.
					
					 Las medidas duras de la RPDC contribuyeron a preservar la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la region de Asia-Pacifico y demostraron claramente a todo el mundo como debe enfrentarse contra EE.UU.
					
					 La posesion del disuasivo nuclear por parte de la RPDC es una justa medida para defender la soberania y la independencia del pais y la nacion frente a la abierta amenaza de EE.UU. y sus lacayos.
					
					 Nos esforzaremos activamente por defender la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 Es preciso establecer el imparcial orden internacional para la paz y la seguridad de Asia y el resto del mundo.
